**Getting to know Mubarak Ganiyu**
Mubarak Ganiyu is from Lagos, Nigeria. 

He got into data science as he loves tinkering with numbers. Having solved numerous statistical problems using the pen-and-paper approach, platforms like R and python made it possible to handle big data and extract crucial information from them.

Mubarak Ganiyu favorite movie is Inglourious basterds.
